name: LD48 - Deep Dive
description:
Swim as far down as you can until you reach the bottom of the sea bed! But be careful, you'll have to click at the right moment or you'll lose your breath!

A Ludum Dare 48 entry where the theme was "Deeper and Deeper"

Controls

Use the left mouse button to click as soon as the slider enters the sweet point


Attributions

Sound Files Used:
